name: Overcoat
description: The Pokemon will have a protective coat surrounding its body that allows it to live under extreme weather conditions.
effect: This Pokemon won't be damaged by weather conditions. Powder Moves also have no effect on the user. These include Cotton Spore, Magic Powder, Poison Powder, Powder, Rage Powder, Sleep Powder, Spore and Stun Spore. The User also cannot be affected by the Ability Effect Spore.
